iam.warning: Use the `!iam` command in ${bot_channel} to assign a role.
iam.suggestion: Try using the command `!iam` to assign a role.

iamnot.warning: Use the `!iamnot` command in ${bot_channel} to remove a role.
iamnot.suggestion: Try using the command `!iamnot` to remove a role.

notify.warning: Use the `!notify` command in ${bot_channel} to add notifications for pokémon.

denotify.warning: Use the `!denotify` command in ${bot_channel} to remove notifications for pokémon.

status.warning: Check the status of raids from a regional channel (i.e. #cc-oakland) or raid channel.
